strapiPost.title: Level Up Your Skills At The Fayetteville Public Library
strapiPost.content:
The first cohort of Fayetteville Public Library's Level Up Skills Development programs is set to begin on Apr 15, with applications currently open for the Skilled Trades certification program.

  • Skills Simulator: Many of the programs utilize virtual reality simulated training. Additional programs in Computer Training and Heavy Equipment Operation will begin accepting applications on May 1.
  • Empowerment: The programs, which are funded by the Friends of Fayetteville Public Library and ARPA funds, aim to provide opportunities for all residents, with a focus on those disproportionately impacted by COVID-19, to achieve higher-wage occupations.

Learn more about these programs and other business-oriented classes HERE.
